author: Paul Rankin
method: Place the sugar and water in a small saucepan over a medium heat. Once the sugar has dissolved remove from the heat. Place the lychees, lime juice and lime zest into a bowl and mix together. Add the sugar syrup to the bowl of lychees and lime and mix together. Serve in a bowl.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz caster sugar,  50ml/2fl oz water,  150g/5½oz fresh lychees, peeled,  ½ lime, juice and zest only
